string.name: name
string.value: Correcting the Past 3: Catching Up to Tortoise
Future Doctor Bing is looking for someone to prevent the delivery of materials to the Processing Plant.
Go to the Underground Passage in the past using the #b#p9250138##k and defeat the #b#o9420073#s#k that are delivering materials for the Time Machine.
You prevented the Time Machine materials from being delivered to the Processing Plant.
Do you remember what happened in the Underground Passage? You delivered the materials to the Processing Plant.
I will send you to the Underground Passage of the past using a black whole activation device.\r\nYou will be fighting against OS4 Shuttles like the one you drove in the past.
Defeat as many shuttles as you can so the Time Machine materials won't be delivered to the Processing Plant.\n\rThe shuttles are strong, so the people inside shouldn't get hurt.
Don't worry, the pilots won't get hurt. Now, hurry!
Do you not have the courage to confront your pass self?
You're back! Thanks to you, we were able to stop much of the materials from reaching the plant.
Still, the deliveries will continue. Please help us again tomorrow!
There are still OS4 Shuttles making their delivery! Fix the past!
